definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Contains rich emollients found in jojoba oil and avocado oil.
sentences.chinese: 含有荷荷巴油及牛油果油之豐富滋潤成分。

sentences.english: Put in the sugar, egg, butter and ammonia to mix thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 中間放入糖，蛋，牛油和臭粉拌勻。

sentences.english: Some hot pot restaurants use paraffin instead of butter.
sentences.chinese: 有些火鍋店用石蠟替代牛油。

sentences.english: Stir in melted butter and lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: 拌入牛油溶液及檸檬汁，拌勻。

sentences.english: Heat oil and butter in a pan, brown chicken pieces and remove.
sentences.chinese: 油與牛油注鍋內燒熱，放下雞件煎至金黃色，取出。

sentences.english: Knead the butter between two baking paper to the same texture as the dough.
sentences.chinese: 牛油放在兩張烤紙中，擀成和麪團硬度一致。

sentences.english: With shea butter for ultimate moisturizing and calendula to help relieve itching.
sentences.chinese: 牛油果油的極限保溼和金盞菊，幫助止癢。

sentences.english: Add the dry ingredients into the butter mixture to form a batter.
sentences.chinese: 把篩好的粉類加入牛油糊中拌勻成麪糊。

sentences.english: Poached Asparagus, Potato Puree, Three Citrus Beurre Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 煮蘆筍，土豆泥，柑橘牛油沙司。

sentences.english: Avocado is highly nutritious, but also high in calories.
sentences.chinese: 牛油果也非常營養，但是卡路里含量也很高。

sentences.english: I think this will replace my Kiehl's Avocado cream.
sentences.chinese: 我想這個眼霜能夠替代Kiehl’s的牛油果眼霜。

sentences.english: Beat margarine and sugar until fluffy.
sentences.chinese: 把植物牛油和砂糖打至松發。

sentences.english: A couple of pieces of whole-grain toast with peanut butter will fit the bill.
sentences.chinese: 兩片夾着花生牛油的全麥吐司就符合這一條了。

sentences.english: Melt butter in a large pan, pour in the dough and sprinkle in raisins.
sentences.chinese: 牛油入鍋融化，倒入拌好的麪糊，灑入提子。

sentences.english: Beat butter and sugar with low speed until well combined.
sentences.chinese: 將無鹽牛油和沙塘以慢速度攪拌均勻。

sentences.english: Heat butter in a skillet until melted.

definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
